title: STAT+: What does Neuralink want — to help people with paralysis, or prepare for a war with AI?
description: Neuralink, a leader in the fledgling field of brain implants, is hurting the industry's efforts to develop useful medical devices, rivals say.
content: Neuralink, a leader in the fledgling field of brain implants, is hurting the industry's efforts to develop useful medical devices, rivals say.
